Text:
Easy! All you can eat bacon wrapped pork-chops!
(and probably goat orgies)
Ironic how the bigot kimm is preaching hate and condemning it in the same sentence.

Yes there are bad people in all religions but
Its funny how we never see Baptist ,catholic ,Satanists or followers of thor blowing themselves and others up in the name of their god   
I guess it takes allah to inspire his followers to kill themselves
